input_text:
Job Title: Growth Specialist

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
Company OverviewAugment Jobs leverages its software, recruiting expertise, and extensive network to automate the recruitment process for job seekers. The company partners with full-time employees, licensed recruiters, and employers to help job seekers navigate the oversaturated job market. Augment Jobs sources job opportunities for its clients and submits applications on their behalf once the clients approve the role. Augment Jobs clients save hundreds of hours on applications and focus their efforts on leveraging the platform to prepare for interviews.
Submit a staffing application to our recruiting team at https://airtable.com/appK6gxCEphlasWY6/shrA31a5FXCWvZAVd. 
Core ValuesClient Outcomes: We exhibit empathy on the nature of the job search process and include a Job Guarantee to ensure every client leaves Augment Jobs with a new job or promotion after working with us.Integrity: We represent our clients to employers and recruiters with the utmost honesty and transparency. This extends to all of our employees and clients who work with us. We work with candidates who accurately represent themselves and have an honor code.Partnership: We are committed to building and maintaining long-term relationships with our clients, coaches, and community.Education: We continuously learn and adapt to changing market conditions and inform our clients in real time on how to stand out in the job application process. Our clients can apply what they learn at Augment Jobs for the rest of their careers.Giving Back: We host free career consultations to build community and create accessibility.
Job Summary:We are seeking a highly analytical, creative, and motivated Growth Analyst to join our team. The Growth Analyst will play a key role in driving our company’s growth strategy by analyzing market trends, customer behavior, and the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns. You will be responsible for providing insights that shape our growth initiatives, identifying opportunities for optimization, and contributing to the development of strategies that improve our product offerings and market presence.
Key Responsibilities:Conduct data analysis to identify trends, measure performance, and evaluate strategies in marketing, sales, product development, and other areas related to growth.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business objectives and identify growth opportunities.Develop and implement analytical frameworks to monitor and optimize the performance of growth initiatives.Perform cohort analyses, customer segmentation, and conversion funnel analysis to understand customer behavior and identify opportunities for improvement.Track and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs) related to growth and provide actionable insights to stakeholders.Design and execute A/B testing experiments to optimize marketing campaigns, product features, and user experience.Prepare and present reports on findings and recommendations to senior management and other key stakeholders.Stay abreast of industry trends and competitive landscape to inform growth strategies.
Required Skills and Qualifications:Bachelor’s degree in Business, Economics, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related field. A Master’s degree is a plus.Proven experience as a Growth Analyst, Data Analyst, or similar role, with a focus on marketing or growth.Strong analytical skills and experience with statistical analysis, forecasting, and modeling techniques.Proficiency in data analysis tools (e.g., SQL, Python, R) and experience with analytics platforms (e.g., Google Analytics, Mixpanel, Amplitude).Excellent problem-solving abilities and a keen eye for detail.Strong communication and presentation skills, with the ability to translate complex data into actionable insights.Creative thinking and a proactive approach to identifying and solving growth challenges.Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.

Experience Level (if available): None

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business objectives
Perform cohort analyses, customer segmentation, and conversion funnel analysis
Track and analyze KPIs related to growth
Design and execute A/B testing experiments
